amendment.description: To require a report assessing the effects of the repeal of the prohibition on the research and development of low-yield nuclear weapons.

vote.text: Amendment SA 790 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 790 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S6896-6897) To require a report assessing the effects of the repeal of the prohibition on the research and development of low-yield nuclear weapons.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 790 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 790 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Bingaman.
